name: liip/imagine-bundle
description: This bundle provides an image manipulation abstraction toolkit for Symfony-based projects.

suggest.ext-exif: required to read EXIF metadata from images
suggest.ext-mongo: required for mongodb components on PHP <7.0
suggest.ext-mongodb: required for mongodb components on PHP >=7.0
suggest.alcaeus/mongo-php-adapter: required on PHP >= 7.0 to use mongo components with mongodb extension
suggest.amazonwebservices/aws-sdk-for-php: required to use AWS version 1 cache resolver
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: required to use AWS version 2/3 cache resolver
suggest.doctrine/mongodb-odm: required to use mongodb-backed doctrine components
suggest.enqueue/enqueue-bundle: ^0.7 add if you like to process images in background
suggest.league/flysystem: required to use FlySystem data loader or cache resolver
suggest.monolog/monolog: A psr/log compatible logger is required to enable logging
suggest.twig/twig: required to use the provided Twig extension. Version 1.12 or greater needed
